extension.description: The BBC UK TV channels released to TVaddons only. Some of the channels in this addon may require a 2mbis - 16mbis or higher connection as they are high speed streams in their country of origin and may buffer from time to time or just not play if you have slower internet speeds. My thanks for Shani_08 for his magic code for f4m streams that inspired this plugin. This works with Helix
extension.disclaimer: This live TV content can change at anytime, we do not run the content server(s) for this addon
